channel.title: How to add d claw spec?
channel.description:
hey i hav a ddsspeced source server (with new home) and v0.6 client with working d claws, d plate, and other custom items but i don't know how to add a 4 hit spec with the claws.
can anyone give me a full tutorial on how to add it?
also offereing mod on my server if it works
